title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4 - Learner's Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4 - Learner's Permits

State Regulations
§ 4.1 - Use in road test area
§ 4.2 - Prohibition against use of learners' permits on certain highways
§ 4.3 - Notice of prohibition
§ 4.4 - Restrictions on class DJ and MJ learner permit operation
§ 4.5 - Repealed
§ 4.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 4

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 501[5], 508 [4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
